title: Elaine Dale: on mine own

description: Episode of Series "TV Eye". This film is about the inspiring story of Elaine Dale, born without arms - as a result of a side effect of the drug Thalidomide - and now married with one child. Elaine speaks of her own personal struggle to live an independent life while her parents tell of their battle with the drug company for adequate compensation as well as the difficulties encountered in rearing Elaine.
